issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: I have tried editing the .plist and get the document/attachment to open in our titanium app, but nothing works out? Is there any solution or approach to get this done?
fields.summary: Support for opening files from email in other(Titanium) apps
fields.environment: Is there any way to get opening attachement from the email, through our Titanium apps?

comments.body: This is not a bug report, but more of a question which could be posted to the community Q&A: http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/
